2938.verse: فَقَدْ|So verily,|82|90|1016$كَذَّبُواْ|they have denied,|140|156|2650$فَسَيَأْتِيهِمْ|then will come to them|172|188|12875$أَنۢبَـٰٓؤُاْ|the news|81|97|5419$مَا|(of) what|83|99|262$كَانُواْ|they used|86|94|94$بِهِۦ|at it|52|307|204$يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ|(to) mock.|123|378|5420$

2941.verse: وَإِنَّ|And indeed|93|110|713$رَبَّكَ|your Lord,|87|120|586$لَهُوَ|surely, He|86|120|2957$ٱلْعَزِيزُ|(is) the All-Mighty,|145|178|1187$ٱلرَّحِيمُ|the Most Merciful.|140|157|398$

2942.verse: وَإِذْ|And when|85|104|308$نَادَىٰ رَبُّكَ|your Lord called|125|163|12878$مُوسَىٰٓ|Musa,|83|121|499$أَنِ|[that],|65|103|4149$ٱئْتِ|"Go|58|96|8050$ٱلْقَوْمَ|(to) the people|121|140|2316$ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ|(who are) wrongdoers|166|166|377$

2945.verse: وَيَضِيقُ|And straitens|108|117|12880$صَدْرِى|my breast|94|111|11394$وَلَا|and not|71|88|25$يَنطَلِقُ|expresses well|115|132|12881$لِسَانِى|my tongue,|95|112|11398$فَأَرْسِلْ|so send|85|102|6657$إِلَىٰ|for|53|62|118$هَـٰرُونَ|Harun.|88|88|2200$

2946.verse: وَلَهُمْ|And they have|117|130|71$عَلَىَّ|against me|92|118|4174$ذَنۢبٌ|a crime,|73|99|12882$فَأَخَافُ|so I fear|85|111|12883$أَن|that|48|74|655$يَقْتُلُونِ|they will kill me."|130|143|12884$

2948.verse: فَأْتِيَا|So go both of you|140|160|12887$فِرْعَوْنَ|(to) Firaun|93|132|2649$فَقُولَآ|and say,|77|116|11444$إِنَّا|`Indeed, we|102|142|120$رَسُولُ|(are the) Messenger|155|175|6924$رَبِّ|(of the) Lord|105|330|7$ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ|(of) the worlds|119|344|8$

2951.verse: وَفَعَلْتَ|And you did|98|104|12893$فَعْلَتَكَ|your deed|86|99|12894$ٱلَّتِى|which|61|74|232$فَعَلْتَ|you did,|73|86|8343$وَأَنتَ|and you|73|86|5375$مِنَ|(were) of|82|95|156$ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ|the ungrateful."|124|130|364$

2934.verse: These are the verses of the clear Book.

2935.verse: Perhaps, [O Muhammad], you would kill yourself with grief that they will not be believers.

2936.verse: If We willed, We could send down to them from the sky a sign for which their necks would remain humbled.

2937.verse: And no revelation comes to them anew from the Most Merciful except that they turn away from it.

2938.verse: For they have already denied, but there will come to them the news of that which they used to ridicule.

2939.verse: Did they not look at the earth - how much We have produced therein from every noble kind?

2940.verse: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.

2941.verse: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

2942.verse: And [mention] when your Lord called Moses, [saying], "Go to the wrongdoing people -

2943.verse: The people of Pharaoh. Will they not fear Allah?"

2944.verse: He said, "My Lord, indeed I fear that they will deny me

2945.verse: And that my breast will tighten and my tongue will not be fluent, so send for Aaron.

2946.verse: And they have upon me a [claim due to] sin, so I fear that they will kill me."

2947.verse: [Allah] said, "No. Go both of you with Our signs; indeed, We are with you, listening.

2948.verse: Go to Pharaoh and say, 'We are the messengers of the Lord of the worlds,

2949.verse: [Commanded to say], "Send with us the Children of Israel."'"

2950.verse: [Pharaoh] said, "Did we not raise you among us as a child, and you remained among us for years of your life?

2951.verse: And [then] you did your deed which you did, and you were of the ungrateful."
